reviews.reviewText: Quick and to the point, the bundle is ABSOLUTELY NOT worth it. Very cheap items. your only saving about 20$-30$ and going to have to spend WAAAAY more to replace/upgrade the items for worth-while parts. The Camera. Is an industry standard. The T7 is very nice for beginners or if you're not sure that this will stick with you and you want to give photography a fair and good shot. You can find the Camera only for about 400$-420$ if you keep searching here. Tripod was the first to break (immediately upon first use) and the lens felt super cheap and didn't make the hugest of differences in image quality. The memory cards have crap stats, you can find a very good SanDisk Extreme 128GB capacity and 150Mb/s transfer speed for 30$ here on amazon. The transfer speed helps with saving image and disk reading for later. It's more than you need since the cam maxes at about 80Mb/s. Transfer speed comes into play when your taking a lot shots back to back and really trying to capture the moments as they happen. However, if you want to jump into the video/film field, I HIGHLY recommend looking into upgrading to the T7i for about 100$ more. you can find the 800D (EU model of the T7i) for 580$ here on Amazon. I upgraded after a week of playing with the T7, and this was fueled by having past experience with a T6i thanks to a friend. The little differences may seem minute, but the y really make a difference and will vastly help beginners who need a helping hand polishing and grinding out their skills. I do strongly recommend the T7i over the regular T7 in general, but this isn't a bad choice at all. Just to reiterate. The camera is GREAT! The bundle is trash.

The camera is wonderful, very to easy to use and I use the camera for my YouTube videos. The picture quality is above average. The product also came with tons of extras that I am using with the camera, what I great buy!

This was an amazing deal. I was looking at the T6 models which I believe are two years older than this model and they were $450. So not only do you get a newer model camera, it's light weight, and you get so many accessories along with it. So happy I ordered this bundle, everything was brand new, in packaging, and arrived quickly. Thank you!

This is my first high end camera purchase, and I was really impressed right out of the box. The camera body is very nice, it's comfortable and sleek. The lens attaches smoothly and the zoom and autofocus work great. I have had a chance to shoot on many of the automatic settings, and the pictures are already nicer than anything else I have taken. I bought the "EOS T7 for Dummies" book as well, and I hope to maximize the potential of the camera with the help of the book. Overall it works great, I had no problems with any of the hardware.
Great for taking evidence pictures
The T7 is an amazing camera for a beginner with all the functions needed to be a photographer and take high quality photos. Plus the bundle gives you everything you need.
Easy to use if you have some camera experience. You can always YouTube instructions or contact Canon with questions.
Great camera and easy to use and light weight. Shipped on time thanks
Its average Camara but very difficult to use. Isnt one on point and shoot. Sometime when try to take picture it wont take it . U have to spend hours and reading manual to use the camera.

We bought this camera to take to Alaska for a cruise and land trip. We took over 1100 pictures of various subjects,glaciers, landscapes, and many pictures of our party. The pictures were clear and a came out great. One 32gb sd car held all our pictures with plenty more room left. All we had to do is go to our favorite processor and get all the prints we wanted. I downloaded the card to DVD so I can look or print at home. I would recommend this camera to any beginner to use and grow with.

I also saw other deal online and at stores like Best buy and Fry electronics it was expensive and also they did not had the extra gadgets with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Had to send to Canon for repair 60 days after purchase.
reviews.reviewText: A vertical line showed up in all images. Canon said to send it in through their arrangement with UPS. Apparently my packaging didn't meet the "requirements" so it cost me $40 total to ship. Asurion refused to cover the $40 when I called to submit the claim saying I had to submit the claim prior to sending. Given the time crunch of having a major event in three weeks and wanting the 'new' camera for it...well lets just say neither Canon nor Photo4Less will be getting a five star from this consumer. Frustrating.

The seller is good but the description should caution that 1. Viewfinder is too small and not useable with glasses, 2. the screen does not tilt (as most digital SLRs do) so awkward to sight and focus quickly or accurately 3. The semi-auto focus is too small (little black dots) to reference as shooting anything moving - got dozens of frames where everything BUT what I was focused on was in focus.
Not a quick-learn, pick up and shoot camera, nor a pro model. Bottom line, I got better shots easier with my iPhone.
Bought for father‚Äôs day and daddy is love ! You get everything you need and more !!! Takes beautiful photos and very easy to figure out !
With twin newborn babies, I love this camera to help me catch unforgettable memories!
Our kit came today and the Large Tripod was broken. So Sad... I paid more for these guys thinking I would get more of a quality product... So sad..

I couldn't believe it when I saw this camera and accessories for this price! I knew I had to have it! The camera it's self is absolutely the best, and all of the accessories make it even better! I love my camera
It came with bunch of other kits, which was nice. The star the the camera, it took good pictures and videos, didn‚Äôt even read the manual. quite easy and fun to use once you get use to it.

the product that was delever for me its brand new thats why i like it,even the package all in there complete. one thing that i notice i ddnt think before i buy that the hand strap not included to the package. i should be check first before i buy online sellers may be they had much more better than the rebel eos T7. honestly e really like it because this is my first time had a new canon camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good value if you price out all the pieces.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use out of the box. Went on cruise to Alaska and took a lot of pictures. Looking forward to learning more about features. Think about getting a higher power lenses for wildlife shots.

I was impressed with the light weight of the camera plus the lens, I was expecting it to be a little heavy. The lens were in perfect condition along with all of the accessories. The carrying bag was nice and cushioned with lots of storage pockets, very durable.
Very pleased with my purchase.
Great set, my teenage daughter is a beginner and this gives her a lot to experiment with. Camera itself is perfect, easy to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Compatible with all or almost all Canon accessories
reviews.reviewText: Very cool product. Wifi is awesome, good quality photos. Lots goodies included. Love it
The camera is wonderful and easy to use. But the picture quality is about average.
Great product

The pic. is not even everything it comes with. I have wanted a Cannon rebel since the second one was out! I was weary at first spending so much online and on Amazon, from a seller at that, new to this, let me tell you though/ A+ to this company, also, the carry bag and probably some of the accessories that come with it (which is EVERYTHING a beginner or more advanced would need to start taking photos and saving, except an outlet for charging the little battery!) but the bag is nice quality too, actually has a lifetime warranty which is cool, the camera is a year warranty, it let me register no problem. It all is brand new, not one scratch. It is the entire camera, not just the body, some people get you with that if youre new looking for a kit, here it is. BUT if you don't plan to continue to use the camera you probably def. don't need all of this or to spend this much on a camera. I guess I'd say this is an in between, not professional use maybe, but not super beginner, yet I am a beginner and I'm making out fine. Its worth it, a picture really is worth 1000 words. I already took a really neat picture with this camera, beautiful. Love the feel, how it holds, the lanyard especially etc., filters and lenses included, so much for such a great quality camera. No not touch screen but who really needs that. No problems, came I think right before e.t.a.. I never write many reviews but I was very pleased with this. need to review the seller, awesome!!!!!! thank you! I see the price actually went down too everyone, this is a steal now. go figure lol.
This is an amazing Camera specially I would say for beginners, it is easy to use & easy to assemble.

qAndA.question: If I open the camera and I do not like it after 2 days, can I still return it?
qAndA.answer: Amazon allows you 30 days to return it

qAndA.question: does it have a flip out screen?
qAndA.answer: No

qAndA.question: How many mega pixels is this camera?
Lots of bad reviews is it as good as people say?
qAndA.answer: We love it !! Not one ounce of buyers remorse !

qAndA.question: Is the camera in the kit (Canon Rebel T7) new?
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: Does the camera come in it's original box?
qAndA.answer: Yes! This was a great deal!

qAndA.question: How good is the performance in low lighting conditions?
qAndA.answer: It depends what lens you are using. If you use the kit lens it comes with you'll get some grain (noise) in very dark situations. To avoid that I try to keep the ISO low and the shutter speed high

qAndA.question: can you put a handstrap on this camera ?
qAndA.answer: Yes you can

qAndA.question: Will the cannon 16 35 f4 lens work with this camera
qAndA.answer: It should

qAndA.question: Does this come with a charger for the battery?
qAndA.answer: Yes it comes with the bundle.

qAndA.question: Use rechargable battery or replaceable batteries ?
qAndA.answer: Rechargeable

qAndA.question: Does this camera kit come with a case or camera bag?
qAndA.answer: Yes it does! It is really great and comes with everything you need to get started right away, and, carry everything with you!

qAndA.question: does this kit come with a mounting bracket for the slave slave flash?
qAndA.answer: Yes but the supplied flash isn‚Äôt compatible with the camera. The camera has a non standard hot shoe mount and only works with a flash made by Canon.

qAndA.question: Does the camera have a gps sensor?
qAndA.answer: As far as I can tell, it does not. I bought it to take pictures in Alaska, glaciers and wild life. The auto settings enabled us to take over 1100 pictures with few bad ones. This camera is great for beginners.

qAndA.question: who is the actual seller for this kit?
qAndA.answer: Photo4less

qAndA.question: Does it really work?
qAndA.answer: Yes- takes great pics! Easy too.

qAndA.question: Does it have a mic
qAndA.answer: Yes, it has a mic included

qAndA.question: Does this camera have an external audio port
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: Does this kit come with batteries for the camera? If not, do I need them and where can I get them?
qAndA.answer: It comes with 1 battery

qAndA.question: Is this a camera with interchangeable lenses
qAndA.answer: yes it comes with two lenses an three filter

qAndA.question: Does this camera have continuous shot? If so how is it?
qAndA.answer: If you are in the action mode yes. I actually have not used that feature. I suggest you look up a u tube video they are great!

qAndA.question: What kind / size batteries does this need ?
qAndA.answer: It is a rechargeable battery pack 7.4V that comes with the camera, also comes with the charger.

qAndA.question: Does this have a clean hdmi output?
qAndA.answer: Bought fir my grand daughter

qAndA.question: What‚Äôs the difference between this and the T6?
qAndA.answer:
One big difference between canon T7 and T6 is that the T7 sensor resolution is 24MP and the T6 is 18MP.
On other hand the T7 weight less than T6 so it is easier to hold while taking pictures. T6 weight 485g and T7 weight 475g.

qAndA.question: Can this record at 60fps?
qAndA.answer: I believe it can, to be safe I would check with Canon.

qAndA.question: Is it WiFi compatible ?
qAndA.answer: Yes it is. You can also connect it to your phone and get the photos instantly

qAndA.question: Does the camera have optional manual settings?
qAndA.answer: Yes, there is a little switch/button near the lens.

qAndA.question: So the headline says it comes with a 64 gig card yet the description says 2x 32 gig cards. Which is it?
qAndA.answer: It comes with (2) 32 gig cards, which equals 64 gigs

qAndA.question: How long can I video with this camera?
qAndA.answer: I could record up to 2 hours before my battery died. I would recommend getting an extra battery if you're recording a lot of video. The memory card that comes with the bundle is really good.

qAndA.question: can older cannon lenses be used on this camera?
qAndA.answer: Depends how old. I know it's not compatible with very old lenses.

qAndA.question: Would you suggest this camera for someone who hasn't used an SLR in over 25 years?
qAndA.answer: Absolutely.

qAndA.question: Does it have a mic jack?
qAndA.answer: yes

qAndA.question: Can it take raw pictures?
qAndA.answer: yap

qAndA.question: Does this camera autofocus?, and are the images sharp?
qAndA.answer: I have the 1500 which has AF/MF. I just got it and am playing with it, no pics have been developed yet.

qAndA.question: Why is this t7‚Äôs cheaper then the t6‚Äôs ? is this just a great deal or is the t7 lacking something the t6‚Äôs have ?
qAndA.answer: One difference is that a standard hot shoe flash does not fit on the T7...the flash supplied with the kit doesn‚Äôt even fit! If you want to use an external flash, the only one I‚Äôve found that works is made by Canon specifically for this new type of hot shoe. Of course that costs half what this camera does. : (

qAndA.question: will these work on my product?
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: Does it come with a manual
qAndA.answer: Yes it does

qAndA.question: does this camera have crop factor
qAndA.answer: I don‚Äôt know bought it for my grand daughter but she‚Äôs loving it. I just bought her the small printer and carrying case for selepy 1300 printer.

qAndA.question: Can this camera take good moon shots?
qAndA.answer: Yeah it can take picture in any lighting.

qAndA.question: Does this bundle come with a camera bag?
qAndA.answer: Mine did, yes.

qAndA.question: Does it automatically adjust focus while video recording?
qAndA.answer: No.

qAndA.question: Is this the canon t7 1500d or the t7 2000 d?
qAndA.answer: It is a T7
